body.p: Enclosed you will find the Judgt vs Brookover -- if the govr respites it; send it immediately to me, I will procure a copy of the Record and send it you, and we will try it in the Appellate Court, please accept my thanks for your attention to this case

Respectfully
yr friend
Jno D Taylor

G P Metcalfe Esq
Frankfort
Ky
